title: Number of pet stores in Canada by region 2018
summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Number of stores for 12 number of Months.
The Number of stores is highest at Month Ontario and lowest at Month Yukon.
The lowest value at Month Yukon is 254.0x times less than the highest value at Ontario.
min_summary: This is a bar chart representing Month in the x axis and Number of stores in the y axis.
The Number of stores is highest at Month Ontario and lowest at Month Yukon.
mid_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Number of stores for 12 number of Months.
The Number of stores is highest at Month Ontario and lowest at Month Yukon.
The lowest value at Month Yukon is 254.0x times less than the highest value at Ontario.
max_summary: This is a bar chart representing Month in the x axis and Number of stores in the y axis.
Month Ontario has the highest Number of stores and Yukon has the lowest Number of stores.
Second maximum Number of stores is found at Month Quebec.
The difference of Number of stores between the highest and lowest Month is 759.0.
Number of stores at Month Ontario is 762.0 , second place is Quebec at 469.0, and thirdly is British Columbia at 348.0.
Over the past 12 Months, the Number of stores has reduced.
Month Yukon, and Northwest Territories have the same Number of stores.
The lowest value 3.0 at Yukon is almost 4.36 times smaller than the average value 174.83.
